product_name: Oakley Pulse Sunglasses - Women's - Gold Iridium Lens
long_description: The women's Oakley Pulse Sunglasses add graceful, flattering style while offering a snug, comfortable fit and sun-blocking performance. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Chocolate Sin frames feature Gold Iridium lenses for reduced glare and high contrast in extremely bright light. Lightweight, flexible nylon frames resist damaging stresses. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp, accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Nose pads and earpads are made from hydrophilic rubber that becomes tackier when you perspire, holding eyewear in place as you move. The Oakley Pulse Sunglasses feature metal icon accents at the hinges.
short_description: The women's Oakley Pulse Sunglasses add graceful, flattering style while offering a snug, comfortable fit and sun-blocking performance.
